newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan's Lite-On plans $67 mln Eurobond.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan's Lite-On plans $67 mln Eurobond.

text.p: Taiwan's Lite-On Technology Corp plans to issue up to US$67 million in convertible bonds in Europe, the company said in a statement said on Monday.
Proceeds from the bonds, whose final value has not yet been fixed, would be used to pay for imported materials, the statement said.
Lite-On, one of Taiwan's leading computer monitor manufacturers, said the seven-year Euroconvertible bonds would be issued in early February but gave no date.
